post.body: .. so obvious... and yet so difficult at the same time... :)
lol... not that your addicted to interwebs or anything then ??? :D balance is key .. ;)
love the avatar ! :) need one of those for my wall.... ;)

rocking - thank you ! *goes to get organised...*
lol.... but OUCH ! too... how was it ? i not had a wisdom out yet... but im looking forward to it... :)
terrible !! but... worth it just once.... :)
- ah yes.. i had noteiced that too.. and not great no.. t'was nice having the legacy items still there upon opening...
- what verion you on now then ? ive not noticed a change, and it updated recently i think... ?
how much you want fo your D2X ???? :) time to upgrade my D70 methinks...
- thats exactly what i understand... i was wondering why Ryan didnt ... ;)
its gotta be the "Cab-Visio-MountBaten" surely !!!
;) .. let you off then.... five mins... then its Staropramen'O'clock.... :D
now now.. lets not be smug.... if you want we can talk about the fresh pow im riding next weekend ?? ;)
- i fly to Geneva on saturday... keep the snow falling for me :)
- yeah, http://tinyurl.com/6epupb is a good indicator of the relative ease for n00bs to use it.. ;)
Sure :) - http://mydrupal.com/joomla-versus-drupal - http://tinyurl.com/5hooho

- powerpoint... sadly... :(
- im down with that... :) might have to grab som mints before i head into this afternoons meetings... ;)
:) always !
- sorry i went offline before i saw the issue !
you just made my Christmas !!! Google / iCal syncing yay ! Does google tasks sync with iCal too ?
it's great - a little thin off-piste, but gorgeously soft and fun on the edges... :)
"I cut and paste logos from the logos folder into all our news releases so there's not a problem at this end" - *faceplant* @ ignorance.

hmmm how to solve this hunger problem ???
suddenly.... IM STARVING !!!
im pretty sure Gmaps just changed the Zoom and Position UI icons whilst i was in the middle of making a custom map... confusing. :)
REM = fail..... byeeeee onwards to rock please....
today.... i am lterally TEARING it up.... :)

i wish http://www.vbs.tv/ did vodcasts.... :(
nice... 1973 by the Pumpkins rocking my world !! :)

settling into some nice note-writing.... :)
hack hack hack at the Moodle install... :)

*sigh* ... Apache... you are some simple... but why do you let Windows bully you so ???
downloading SQL and data to setup a mirror of a live server inside a room.... surely interent would just have been easier ???
time for some Annie Mac to get through the arvo... :)
RT ryancarson: ... Is Firewire or USB faster these days? - i thought he was a tech ??? ;)
*Changing priorities ahead....*
hmmm duh !!! http://tinyurl.com/679fnj didnt they cause all this ??? idiots..

full blown case of narcolepsy on the tybe platform... buy keeled over, out-cold... then woke, sat bolt-upright and carried on.... odd.
i know its the case as ive already seen something very odd this-morning...
Cold beer, slow breaksand some art - ace !
one word..... BEER.
tick tock ..... tick tock.... friday afternoons are THE slowest.... :(
DAMN YOU FTP UP-SPEED !! your hindering my exit to the battle-cruiser.... Grrr.
friday arvo... must reporting time.... *sigh*
The Laid-off beard... http://tinyurl.com/6768rp close to my soon-to-be... slacking-off-beard... :)
couple more hours... then heading over to the ICA to meet Charlie for some friday beers and some art... yum.
Mmmm fish and chips for lunch = good diea.. eating them... = bad idea... urgh... need acid for my stomach.... :(
searchig for SSH over iPhone and not happy... when will they put out a normal client ? :(
is dabbling with more Ubuntu Linux-ness... oh joy...
hoping my new residence has wifi when i move in tmrw... could be disatrerous if not ..
Alex and his very cool business making mini-houses.... he always was odd... :) http://www.play-houses.com
the race is on - frantic development to get this site up and working by monday morning for 50 conference attendees...
Drinking free beer in Cargo...
wow.. who would have thought New Zealand has the second highest crime rate in the world ?
ok, i need help people - James Bond theme Xmas party - nothing whatsoever prepared - whop do i go as ? and what do i need ?
VERY impressed with the lunchtime play-test.. streamed a show to iPhone from iPlayer and it didnt hickup as i walk out of wifi into 3G land.
Green curry won. And I'm being served by @vlux 's favourite barmaid ... :)

feeling the hunger... what should i head for ? green curry/chicken salad/cheap sandwich - you decide.... :)
oh good-god... people who are not web-savvy should not be allowed to edit web content - period. blaming the tools is not the way forward !
RT @MelKirk: Sprouts. Can't wait to eat sprouts. Yes, I'm one of those. - I will miss sprouts AGAIN this year.. :( i love those lil things

Sitting in the chalet, the two families of kids are departing today... Will get kit on for a ride soon. It's -6 outside...
Christmas day in the Alps.. What a great idea. Snow in the morning, half pipe and off-piste I'm the afternoon and a full dinner served at 6!
Happy christmas ! http://twitpic.com/waqo

its weird... having been desperate for this moment for months...im now feeling quite sad at not coming back to this office on monday.life !
heading for the bar soon.... i really need it now... what a shit afternoon...
